Name: Introduction to Quantum Chemistry (Special Edition - Chemical Principles Part 1)

ReviewList.Text: Seller was very nice and reliable. I discovered much later that my professor changed the required textbook for the course after I had purchased the book through Amazon. I immediately emailed the seller of what had happened and asked for a possible refund. They canceled the shipping and gave me a refund, which was very understanding of them. Would greatly recommend buying books from them, very reliable.
